content: XXXhttp://online.wsj.com/article/SB124162698709392269.htmlXXX Wade Sanders, who pleaded guilty in December to possession of child pornography, was sentenced Monday, and he got off relatively easy. The San Diego Union-Tribune reports that Judge Thomas Whelan sentenced Sanders to just 37 months in prison--barely a third of the 10-year maximum, and more than two years less than the 63 months prosecutors had asked for. Sanders had argued that he deserved only probation, claiming that what the paper calls "his compulsion to research the world of child pornography" was "a symptom of his post-traumatic stress disorder that stemmed from his combat service"--that is, he was depraved on account of he was deployed. In 2009, Kerry vouched for Sanders's character despite Sanders's admission to obsessively collecting child pornography. In 2004, Sanders vouched for Kerry's character.... Maybe you all can answer better than me. Were you compelled by your combat experiences to collect Child Pornography? no one I know was.

content: XXXhttp://online.wsj.com/article/SB124162698709392269.htmlXXX Wade Sanders, who pleaded guilty in December to possession of child pornography, was sentenced Monday, and he got off relatively easy. The San Diego Union-Tribune reports that Judge Thomas Whelan sentenced Sanders to just 37 months in prison--barely a third of the 10-year maximum, and more than two years less than the 63 months prosecutors had asked for. Sanders had argued that he deserved only probation, claiming that what the paper calls "his compulsion to research the world of child pornography" was "a symptom of his post-traumatic stress disorder that stemmed from his combat service"--that is, he was depraved on account of he was deployed. In 2009, Kerry vouched for Sanders's character despite Sanders's admission to obsessively collecting child pornography. In 2004, Sanders vouched for Kerry's character.... Maybe you all can answer better than me. Were you compelled by your combat experiences to collect Child Pornography? no one I know was.
